title: The North Face
subtitle: A Trailblazing Packaging System
description: The North Face has been the pinnacle of outdoor gear for over 45 years. Always pushing the edge, the brand sought to up their game with a fresh, sleek look that would resonate with hard-core athletes for the long haul.
